gui.ascension.title: Skill Tree
gui.ascension.controls_hint: L-Click to Drag, Scroll to Zoom, M-Click to Toggle Skill
gui.ascension.reset.tooltip:
Reset all skills
Cost: 1395 XP (+1395/reset)
Cooldown: 10 Days
Refunds all Skill Points
gui.ascension.help.active_skill.title: Active Skill Guide
gui.ascension.help.active_skill.drag: Drag icons to slots below to equip
gui.ascension.help.active_skill.keys:
Select Slot: Alt + Num/Scroll
Primary: Alt + L-Click
Secondary: Alt + R-Click
gui.ascension.material_help.reduce_cd: R-Click: Consume material to reduce CD by 25%
message.ascension.parent_locked: Parent locked! You need to learn: %s
message.ascension.criteria_failed: Criteria not met! Check the skill tree.
message.ascension.parent_locked_any: Parent locked! You must unlock at least one parent skill.
message.ascension.refund_points: [Ascension] Skill cost adjustment detected. %s skill points have been refunded.
message.ascension.flight_no_space: Not enough headroom for Sword Flight!
message.ascension.too_hungry_to_start: You are too hungry to focus on reading...
message.ascension.too_hungry_to_read: You are starving! You put the book down...
message.ascension.reset_cooldown: Reset is on cooldown. Remaining: %s days
message.ascension.reset_success: Skill Tree reset! Skill points refunded.
message.ascension.slot_cooldown_active: Cannot swap: Skill is currently on cooldown!
message.ascension.skill_not_recharged: Skill not fully recharged, cannot unequip!
message.ascension.blink_fail: Could not find a safe destination nearby!
message.ascension.slot_locked: Slot locked! Upgrade the 'Mastery' skill to unlock.
message.ascension.cooldown_full: All skills are ready, no need to accelerate.
skill.ascension.mining.desc: Improve efficiency in breaking and creating.
skill.ascension.golden_house.desc: Hold Right-Click to read Enchanted Books, converting Hunger into Experience. Reading progress is saved. (XP gain scales with enchantment levels).
skill.ascension.golden_house.desc.2: Hold Right-Click to read Enchanted Books, converting Hunger into MORE Experience. Reading progress is saved.
skill.ascension.golden_house.desc.3: Hold Right-Click to read Enchanted Books, converting Hunger into MASSIVE Experience. Reading progress is saved.
skill.ascension.telekinesis.desc: Manifest your will physically. Increases block interaction range by 1 block.
skill.ascension.telekinesis.desc.2: Manifest your will physically. Increases block interaction range by 2 blocks.
skill.ascension.zhu_rong.desc: Allows eating Magma Cream. Each consumed grants +2 Fire Damage on the next attack (Crit applied). Stacks up to 2 times.
skill.ascension.zhu_rong.desc.4: Max stack count increased to 5. Set the world ablaze!
skill.ascension.fire_resistance.desc.2: Halves fire damage taken and extinguishes fire twice as fast.
skill.ascension.fire_infection.desc: Fight fire with fire! Ignites attackers when you are damaged while burning.
skill.ascension.thermal_dynamo.desc: Danger driven! +30% Movement Speed and +20% Attack Damage while burning.
skill.ascension.fire_res.desc: Ignore fire damage, just like a Nether native.
Slowly regenerates health and hunger when exposed to the sky during Rain or Thunderstorms.
Regenerates health and hunger in rain/thunder. If environment changes, grants Resistance I for 12s.
skill.ascension.sacrificial_strike.desc: First attack after a multi-jump hang time deals +20% damage. Damage increases closer to the ground (up to +20% more).
First attack after a multi-jump hang time deals +40% damage. Damage increases closer to the ground (up to +20% more).
skill.ascension.wolf_pack.desc: 10% chance to summon 1-2 tamed wolves when hurt. Chance increases with damage taken (max +30%).
skill.ascension.wolf_pack.desc.3: Max summon count increased to 4. If you have Bones in inventory, consumes them to guarantee summons!
skill.ascension.bamboo_cutting.desc: Smooth as cutting bamboo. Sword or Axe attacks have a 10% chance to instantly reset attack cooldown.
skill.ascension.bamboo_cutting.desc.4: Trigger chance increased to 33%. Speed is paramount!
skill.ascension.dragon_boat_rower.desc: Rowing speed +33% when holding a Shovel, but consumes durability.
skill.ascension.dragon_boat_rower.desc.2: Rowing speed +66% when holding a Shovel, but consumes durability.
skill.ascension.brain_in_a_jar.desc: Allows wearing Glass as a helmet. Grants Water Breathing for 12s (like Turtle Shell). Glass provides 1 Armor, 50% break chance on hit.
skill.ascension.brain_in_a_jar.desc.2: Allows wearing Glass as a helmet. Grants Water Breathing for 24s. Glass provides 1 Armor, 50% break chance on hit.
skill.ascension.brain_in_a_jar.desc.3: Allows wearing Glass as a helmet. Grants Water Breathing for 36s. Glass provides 1 Armor, 50% break chance on hit.
skill.ascension.brain_in_a_jar.desc.4: Allows wearing Glass as a helmet. Grants Water Breathing for 48s. Glass provides 1 Armor, 50% break chance on hit.
skill.ascension.brain_in_a_jar.desc.5: Allows wearing Glass as a helmet. Grants Water Breathing for 60s. Glass provides 2 Armor, break chance reduced to 5%.
skill.ascension.rocket_boost.desc: Allows you to jump one extra time in mid-air.
skill.ascension.rocket_boost.desc.2: Allows you to jump two extra times in mid-air.
skill.ascension.charged_jump.desc: Sneak and hold Jump to charge. Release to launch higher and further.
skill.ascension.charged_jump.desc.2: Sneak and hold Jump to charge. Release to launch extremely high and far.
skill.ascension.adrenaline_burst.desc: Grants Absorption and Speed when taking heavy damage at full health.
skill.ascension.adrenaline_burst.desc.2: Grants massive Absorption and Speed when taking heavy damage at full health.
skill.ascension.excitement.desc: When taking heavy damage, rapidly consumes hunger to regenerate health.
skill.ascension.excitement.desc.2: When taking heavy damage, consumes hunger to regenerate massive amounts of health.
skill.ascension.hunger_constitution.desc: Grants more Absorption when hunger drops.
skill.ascension.hotpot_diner.desc: Eating cooked meat has a 10% chance to restore 3 hearts.
skill.ascension.hotpot_diner.desc.2: Eating cooked meat has a 20% chance to restore 3 hearts.
skill.ascension.hotpot_diner.desc.3: Eating cooked meat has a 30% chance to restore 3 hearts.
skill.ascension.sugar_master.desc: Eating Cake Slices or Pumpkin Pie grants 1.5 extra Saturation.
skill.ascension.sugar_master.desc.2: Eating Cake Slices or Pumpkin Pie grants 3.0 extra Saturation.
skill.ascension.sugar_master.desc.3: Eating Cake Slices or Pumpkin Pie grants 4.5 extra Saturation. If saturation overflows, it instantly heals health!
skill.ascension.hunger_tolerance.desc: Regenerate health as long as hunger is not zero.
skill.ascension.hunger_burst.desc: Grants Speed and Strength when starving (0 hunger).
skill.ascension.hunger_burst.desc.2: Grants Speed and Strength when starving (0 hunger).
skill.ascension.pocket_furnace.desc: Auto-smelts the item in the last hotbar slot. Low efficiency.
skill.ascension.pocket_furnace.desc.2: Auto-smelts the item in the last hotbar slot. Medium efficiency.
skill.ascension.lumberjack.desc: Slightly increases mining speed for logs and leaves.
skill.ascension.lumberjack.desc.2: Moderately increases mining speed for logs and leaves.
skill.ascension.lumberjack.desc.3: Significantly increases mining speed for logs and leaves.
skill.ascension.miner_frenzy.desc: Slightly increases mining speed for stone-type blocks.
skill.ascension.miner_frenzy.desc.2: Moderately increases mining speed for stone-type blocks.
skill.ascension.miner_frenzy.desc.3: Significantly increases mining speed for stone-type blocks.
skill.ascension.hephaestus_favor.desc: 35% chance to drop Quartz when mining Granite, Andesite, or Diorite.
skill.ascension.hephaestus_favor.desc.3: Increases drop chance to 70%, and adds a chance to drop Raw Iron.
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc: Use a Shovel on Sand to consume 4 durability and find Gold Ingots (5% chance)! Chance affected by shovel tier and Fortune.
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.2: Use a Shovel on Sand to find Gold Ingots (7% chance).
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.3: Use a Shovel on Sand to find Gold Ingots (9% chance).
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.4: Use a Shovel on Sand to find Gold Ingots (11% chance).
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.5: Use a Shovel on Sand to find Gold Ingots (13% chance).
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.6: Use a Shovel on Sand to find Gold Ingots (15% chance).
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.7: Use a Shovel on Sand to find Gold Ingots (17% chance).
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.8: Use a Shovel on Sand to find Gold Ingots (19% chance).
skill.ascension.academic_miner.desc: Grants extra experience when mining ores.
skill.ascension.academic_miner.desc.2: Grants more extra experience when mining ores.
skill.ascension.swift_move.desc: You run faster. Speed increased by 13%.
skill.ascension.swift_move.desc.2: You run faster. Speed increased by 25%.
skill.ascension.swift_move.desc.3: You run faster. Speed increased by 40%.
skill.ascension.human_dynamo.desc: Kinetic conversion! Gain 5 XP for every 100 meters traveled.
skill.ascension.human_dynamo.desc.2: Gain 8 XP for every 100 meters traveled.
skill.ascension.human_dynamo.desc.3: Gain 11 XP for every 100 meters traveled.
skill.ascension.sword_flight.desc: Equip a Sword in your Boots slot to fly! Sprint to accelerate. Consumes sword durability while flying.
skill.ascension.sword_flight.desc.2: Max speed increased to 1.5x, but durability cost is doubled. Crashing into enemies deals massive damage and unequips the sword.
skill.ascension.thunder_clap.desc:
Summon devastating lightning at your crosshair.

§6Cost:§f Copper Ingot (Basic) / Diamond (Empowered)
§bEffect:§f Strikes 1 lightning bolt at the target.
§eSecondary:§f Strikes lightning on yourself.
skill.ascension.thunder_clap.desc.2:
Summon devastating lightning at your crosshair.

§6Cost:§f Copper Ingot (Basic) / Diamond (Empowered)
§bEffect:§f Strikes 3 lightning bolts at the target area.
§eSecondary:§f Strikes lightning on yourself.
skill.ascension.thunder_clap.desc.3:
Summon devastating lightning at your crosshair.

§6Cost:§f Copper Ingot (Basic) / Diamond (Empowered)
§bEffect:§f Strikes 5 lightning bolts at the target area.
§eSecondary:§f Strikes lightning on yourself.
skill.ascension.blink.desc:
Teleport instantly in the direction you are looking.

§6Cost:§f Copper Ingot (Basic) / Ender Pearl (2x Distance)
§bEffect:§f Teleports 12 blocks. Auto-adjusts for obstacles.
§eSecondary:§f Alt + R-Click to teleport to a random nearby location.
skill.ascension.blink.desc.2:
Teleport instantly in the direction you are looking.

§6Cost:§f Copper Ingot (Basic) / Ender Pearl (2x Distance)
§bEffect:§f Teleports 12 blocks. Auto-adjusts for obstacles.
§eSecondary:§f Alt + R-Click to teleport to a random nearby location.
skill.ascension.blink.desc.3:
Teleport instantly in the direction you are looking.

§6Cost:§f Copper Ingot (Basic) / Ender Pearl (2x Distance)
§bEffect:§f Teleports 18 blocks. Auto-adjusts for obstacles.
§eSecondary:§f Alt + R-Click to teleport to a random nearby location.
skill.ascension.blink.desc.4:
Teleport instantly in the direction you are looking.

§6Cost:§f Copper Ingot (Basic) / Ender Pearl (2x Distance)
§bEffect:§f Teleports 18 blocks. Auto-adjusts for obstacles.
§eSecondary:§f Alt + R-Click to teleport to a random nearby location.
criterion.ascension.boat_on_ice: Rowed a boat %s meters on ice
criterion.ascension.enchant_sword_three_: Reinforced the same sword 3 times using an Anvil
criterion.ascension.trade_4_books: Obtained 4 different Enchanted Books via trading
